Title: The Witches
Genre: Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery
Actors: Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Rowan Atkinson
Plot: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.
Production: Jim Henson Productions, Lorimar Film Entertainment
